title: Apple Pie

comments.body: Solid apple pie! Well I don't mean it is actually solid I mean it is really good ... it's actually both soft and crusty.  I don't mean like bad crusty, I mean like the crust is ... oh nevermind.
comments.name: Caderyn Jenkins

comments.body: Mine is better, but this pretty good.
comments.name: Grace Hopper

directions: Put bottom crust in pan place in refrigerator
Peal, decore and chop apple into 1/2 to 1 inch pieces (or slice into thin pieces)
Mix flour with sugar and spices
Mix apples with flour/spice/sugar and juice from lemon
Pour into pan with bottom crust and optionally slice a few pieces of button on top
Place top crust on top and pinch sides. Cut small slits into middle of top.
Cover edges with foil around top of crust and remove durning last 20 mintues.
